body_text:
In general we don't prefer to run our own separate authentication, but instead prefer to rely on an auth provider. This would help with things like having to encrypt and send passwords to new users, having to implement a password-change UI for the control interface, etc.
@jvehent I hear Auth0 is ready for primetime. Is using that as the in-site auth, paired with VPN access, sufficient for Normandy?

title: Switch to an authentication provider
body:
In general we don't prefer to run our own separate authentication, but instead prefer to rely on an auth provider. This would help with things like having to encrypt and send passwords to new users, having to implement a password-change UI for the control interface, etc.

@jvehent I hear Auth0 is ready for primetime. Is using that as the in-site auth, paired with VPN access, sufficient for Normandy?
